price: 180. Xurmo oo dhan waxaa iska leh oo (xumaan ka) hufan Rabbigaa (Allaah), Rabbiga Sharafta leh, ka sarreeya waxay (gaaladu) ku tilmaamaan (sida inuu leeyahay wiil, gabdho, xaas, iwm).
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbika rabbi al-ʿizati ʿammā yaṣifūna
